Company subcontractors are not covered by this program. To be eligible for a corporate credit card, an employee must either (a) incur legitimate EPAM-related business travel expenses in the course of performing EPAM services, (b) be responsible to purchase goods and services for use by EPAM; (c) or incur other regular, frequent legitimate and approved business expenses appropriately paid by credit card. The corporate card program is not to be used as a substitute or workaround for regular invoice-billing or EPAM’s standard Accounts Payable process.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reminder: All EPAM software and hardware (e.g. laptops, ipads, other computer hardware), licenses, subscriptions, phones, furniture or other equipment purchases are managed by the procurement team, not the credit card program.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Limits\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The default card limit is $5K in the equivalent of your card program currency. Increases to the limit may be made on a case-by-case basis with RM/AM approval.
